title: Cottage pie with dauphinoise potato
description: This is the perfect meal to serve when all the family are around as everyone can help themselves to as little or as much as they want. It’s generous enough for second helpings and if by any chance there are leftovers, it tastes great the next day. It’s so much smarter than the usual cottage pie, so is perfect for casual supper parties too.Equipment and preparation: you will need a 2.4 litre/4 pint ovenproof shallow dish.
ingredients: 1.5kg/3lb 5oz King Edward potatoes, peeled and sliced into 4mm slices
